projectItems.title: What type of primary products are being processed?

resultProducts.title: What products will you produce as a result of the project?

answers.result-products-A1: primary product that are kept in controlled atmosphere storage for longer so that they can be sold at a higher price
answers.result-products-A2: primary product that are kept in dynamic controlled atmosphere storage, so that they can be sold at a higher price
answers.result-products-A3: Primary product(s) that is prepared so that it can be sold at a higher price i.e washed veg/top and tail.
answers.result-products-A4: primary product(s) that is graded so that it can be sold at a higher price
answers.result-products-A5: primary product(s) that is packaged so that it can be sold at a higher price
answers.result-products-A6: A new product(s) from the primary product(s) that you grow so that it can be sold at a higher price

projectImpact.title: What impact will the project have?

answers.project-impact-A1: Enables creation of new added-value products for the applicant business
answers.project-impact-A2: Increases volume of existing added-value products for the applicant business

businessImpact.title: What growth impact will the project have on your business?

answers.business-impact-A4: Introduces innovative equipment or processes new to the business
answers.business-impact-A5: Introduces added-value processing as entirely new business activity

marketImpacts.title: What impact will the project have on your markets?

answers.market-impacts-A2: Opens new Wholesale routes to market
answers.market-impacts-A3: Opens new Retail routes to market

supplyChainImpacts.title: What impact will the project have on supply chain businesses?

answers.supply-chain-impacts-A1: Produces quantifiable benefits to other named producers
answers.supply-chain-impacts-A2: Enables new collaborations or formal partnerships
answers.supply-chain-impacts-A3: Benefits existing  collaborations or formal partnerships

foodMileImpacts.title: What impact will the project have on ‘food miles’?

answers.food-mile-impacts-A1: At Point of Origin - at growers/producers location

environmentImpacts.title: What impact will the project have on the environment?
